## Literature

```{r echo=FALSE}
slackico <- as.character("/logos/slack-ico.png{width=20px}")

  ),
  
  chapters <- c("Chapters 1: Introduction, 2: Social Capital and Small Worlds - A Primer & 3: \ Getting Ego-Nets"),

    "*not applicable*"
    ),

)
```
